questions.question: The characteristics of IGBT is a combination of which of the following two devices?
Which of the following statements about an Insulated Gate Bipolar Transistor(IGBT) is not true?

answers.a: The IGBT is developed by combining the characteristics of a BJT and a MOSFET
answers.b: The on-state losses of an IGBT are lesser than a MOSFET
answers.c: The IGBT is slower than a BJT
answers.d: The IGBT contains a parasitic thyristor

questions.question: Which of the following is a demerit of IGBT?

answers.a: a DC voltage is applied to control the operation of device
answers.b: the ratio of majority carriers to minority carriers
answers.c: the amount of current across a diode

questions.question: For a voltage controlled device like IGBT, which of the following is true?

answers.a: Output current depends on output voltage
answers.b: Input current depends on output current
answers.c: Output current depends on input current
answers.d: Output current depends on input voltage
